name: Allied Commerce
overview:
Allied Commerce is a privately held American electronic commerce company based in Seattle, Washington. It is a provider of enterprise E-Commerce automation solutions targeted to medium to large E-Commerce re-sellers. Its flagship product, the Allied Commerce platform is composed of an integrated set of applications that perform specific E-Commerce functions. The applications that make up the Allied Commerce platform can be deployed separately or as a whole.

The Allied Commerce platform is provided using the Software as a Service (SaaS) model, with all the disparate applications running from cloud based servers.

Allied Commerce also has a consulting branch that is geared towards providing expert technical advice as well as custom software development services to merchants looking to build robust E-Commerce solutions or enhance their current solutions.
